subject: Invoking junit.textui.TestRunner from javacode
msgSnippet: Hi all I am having some truble invoking junit from javacode. My testcode test code in a package located on my computer but it sems like it doesent find it. I
messageBody:
Hi all

I am having some truble invoking junit from javacode. My testcode
test code in a package located on my computer but it sems like it
doesent find it. I collect all test in a testsuite and run them with
junit.textui.TestRunner. As long as the testcode are not dependent
on the code in the jar it runs ok.
I have tried setting the path to the jar-file with System.setProperty
("java.class.path",newClasspath) in the code but it doesent help at
all.

I hope someone would give me som help here! :o)
